error.signature: Warning: Invalid DOM property 'class'. Did you mean 'className'?
error.regex: Invalid DOM property|Did you mean 'className'|did you mean.*class

verdict.summary: HTML attributes in JSX use camelCase. class → className, for → htmlFor, etc.

dead_ends.why_fails: Overkill and XSS risk for a simple attribute rename

workarounds.action: Use React attribute names: className, htmlFor, tabIndex, readOnly, etc.
Most HTML attributes are camelCase in JSX except data-* and aria-*

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'Warning' is a jsx_error error while 'Module not found' has a different failure mode despite similar symptoms. Check error message details to differentiate.
